Claim: "A brown and white dog is chained up near a red chair."
Implication: "The dog is chained to a chair."
Referring expressions: Brown and white dog, red chair  dog, chair
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsBrownAndWhite(a) and IsNear(a,b))) & (forall f (forall e (forall h (forall g ( IsChainedTo(e,f) ->   IsNear(g,h))))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsChainedTo(c,d))))
